Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = true
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Sword = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid
local connection
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Tool.Enabled = true
local lastAttack = 0
local runService = game:service("RunService")
local firePart local fire local fireWeld
if Sword:FindFirstChild("FirePart") == nil then firePart = Instance.new("Part") firePart.FormFactor = 3 firePart.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) firePart.Transparency = 1.0 firePart.Name = "FirePart" firePart.Parent = Sword
fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Parent = firePart fire.Color = Color3.new(1, 0, 0) fire.SecondaryColor = Color3.new(128/255, 128/255, 128/255) fire.Heat = 25 fire.Size = 2
fireWeld = Instance.new("Weld") fireWeld.Name = "FireWeld" fireWeld.Part0 = Sword fireWeld.Part1 = firePart fireWeld.Parent = Sword
else firePart = Sword.FirePart fire = firePart:FindFirstChild("Fire") fireWeld = Sword.FireWeld end
local daggerSound
local cooldown
local speeding = false
local dashTime = 0 local lastKeyDown = 0 local lastAttack = 0
function charge(key) if myHumanoid == nil or myTorso == nil then return end if key:lower() == "w" then local t = runService.Stepped:wait() if (t - lastKeyDown < 0.2) then dashTime = t end lastKeyDown = t end end
function dash(humanoid, torso) local holdAnim = humanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.HoldAnim) if holdAnim then holdAnim:Play() else Tool.Enabled = true return end local target = humanoid.TargetPoint local direction = (target - torso.Position) * Vector3.new(1, 0, 1) newBV = nil swordShave() if direction.magnitude > .01 then direction = direction.unit newBV = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") newBV.P = 100000 newBV.maxForce = Vector3.new(newBV.P, 0, newBV.P) newBV.velocity = direction * 50 newBV.Parent = torso torso.CFrame = CFrame.new(torso.Position, target * Vector3.new(1, 0, 1) + Vector3.new(0, torso.Position.Y, 0)) end wait(.75) if newBV ~= nil then newBV:remove() end wait(.5) swordUp() end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid then local creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Value = player creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Parent = humanoid debris:AddItem(creatorTag, 1) end end
function blow(hit) local damage = 22 if hit == nil or hit.Parent == nil or vCharacter == nil then return end local humanoid = hit.Parent:findFirstChild("Humanoid") local vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if humanoid~=nil and humanoid ~= myHumanoid and myHumanoid ~= nil then local rightArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if rightArm then local rightGrip = rightArm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if rightGrip and (rightGrip.Part0 == Sword or rightGrip.Part1 == Sword) then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) if humanoid.Parent:FindFirstChild("LionFireScript") == nil then local cloneScript = script.LionFireScript:Clone() cloneScript.Parent = humanoid.Parent cloneScript.Disabled = false end end end end end
function swordUp() Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, -1, 0) Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(1, 0, 0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(0, 0, -1) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, -1, 0) end
function swordShave() Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1) Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(1, 0 ,0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(0, -1, 0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 0 ,1) end
function swordOut() Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0, -1, 0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(1, 0, 0) end
function lunge() if lungeSound then lungeSound:play() end
local anim = Instance.new("StringValue") anim.Name = "toolanim" anim.Value = "Lunge" anim.Parent = Tool
local force = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") force.velocity = Vector3.new(0, 12, 0) force.Parent = myTorso
wait(0.25) swordOut() wait(0.25) if force then force:Remove() end wait(0.5) swordUp() end
function attack() local anim = Instance.new("StringValue") anim.Name = "toolanim" anim.Value = "Slash" anim.Parent = Tool end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
local t = runService.Stepped:wait() if t - dashTime < 0.2 then dash(myHumanoid, myTorso) elseif t - lastAttack < 0.2 then daggerSound = Sword:FindFirstChild("SwordSound") if daggerSound then daggerSound:Play() end lunge() else attack() end lastAttack = t
Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped(mouse) if fireWeld then local reWeld = fireWeld:Clone() reWeld.Name = "FireWeld" reWeld.Parent = Sword end vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if mouse then mouse.KeyDown:connect(charge) end end
function onUnequipped() if myHumanoid then myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 end if holdAnim then holdAnim:Stop() end if daggerSound then daggerSound:Stop() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
connection = Sword.Touched:connect(blow)

local vCharacter = script.Parent local myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso")
if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then script:Remove() end
local fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Color = Color3.new(1, 0, 0) fire.SecondaryColor = Color3.new(128/255, 128/255, 128/255) fire.Parent = myTorso
local duration = 6
while duration > 0 do myHumanoid:TakeDamage(4) if myHumanoid.Health < 10 then myHumanoid.Health = 0 end duration = duration - 1 wait(1.0) end
if fire then fire:Remove() end
wait(2.0) script:Remove()
